name: Get Hoisted (SuperBiasedMan)
description:
A Hoistball simulator for Wizard Jam 6.

Music by Aidan Thomas Tobin
https://soundcloud.com/aidantobin

Font - Night Machine By Chequered Ink
https://www.dafont.com/night-machine.font

Controls:
WASD to move drone.
Q and E to toggle through drones.
Left click and hold to charge a hoistball.
Release left click to throw a hoistball
